mapper.select: SELECT r.*, nvl2(l.LIKER,1,0) AS isLike, nvl2(d.DISLIKER,1,0) AS isDislike, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY_LIKE sl WHERE sl.reply_idx = r.reply_idx ) AS "like" , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY_DISLIKE sd WHERE sd.reply_idx = r.reply_idx ) AS "dislike" FROM REPLY r LEFT JOIN REPLY_LIKE l ON r.REPLY_IDX = l.REPLY_IDX AND l.LIKER = #{user_idx} LEFT JOIN REPLY_DISLIKE d ON r.REPLY_IDX = d.REPLY_IDX AND d.DISLIKER = #{user_idx} WHERE r.feed_idx= #{feed_idx} order by r.REPLY_IDX desc
